feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:10 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 5:56 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: SW 17 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning late this evening. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
